website_summaries.verdict: The female version of the classic toy – just like you may remember from your childhood.
pros: Potato Head with pieces that include a purse, hairdo, shoes, and more – 12 pieces total
cons: Pieces have been known to fit loosely, or fall out of the holes altogether
Some pieces are difficult to put into the holes

customer_reviews.title: Classic Toy-Loose Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Classic toy that is fun for any little kid. My only complaint is that many of the pieces don't seem to stick into the potato head very well. The hair doesnt stay on at all and the legs also fall off easily. For little toddler hands that carry it around, this is frustrating when they just want to show you the funny face they made, but the pieces all fall out on the walk over to show it off!
customer_reviews.author: Practical Mama

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel like the old Mr
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't feel like the old Mr.Potato head I grew to love. The quality seems much more cheaply made now. But my kids don't know any different and they play with it like crazy and they love it. Minus losing pieces all the time and the quality decrease from way back (which is common these days), I still recommend this product because it has lasted and the kids enjoy it and that is what it was purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew81

customer_reviews.title: Elbow Grease
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute idea but the pieces are really hard to push in and take out. So consider that when buying for a younger kiddo. I also wish it came with more accessories even if slightly more pricey. I got the cheaper one in case my daughter was not too interested and now see to get more accessories you need to buy another potato. So may want to spring for more expensive one up front. The other issue to note is that the hair does not stay on at all. Which is kinda annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters favorite Christmas gift 2015. Perfect gift, even competing with all the electronics!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how this old classic, still keeps today's kids interest. Great for fine motor skills and getting away from electronics! Please, let's get back to toys that do more than entertain by a push of the power button. My daughter was impressed that at 2 and a half, my granddaughter loves this more than any other Christmas gift. Lol. And I think I spent $7 or so. Haha! She's still playing with it, almost a year later. I'm proud of myself on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julie from Beaverton

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISSAPOINTING
customer_reviews.text: Does not sit well in the stand (topples over) - pegs don't fit in holes very well. Not a very good plastic. Contacted manufacturer - they will send me a new one without sending me the bad one. I hope it's better. Made in India. I also purchased the Buzz Year & it is the same way.
customer_reviews.author: c-bert

customer_reviews.title: It’s a potato head.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived with the boxing damaged. It had clearly been used, as there was a piece rattling around in her butt. Everything was there, though. And as it was going to a 3 year old, who doesn’t care about the box... not a big deal in the long run. Just felt a little misled by the description.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: One of the classics
customer_reviews.text: We bought this at the same time as a Mr. Potato Head and both are great. Yes, the pieces might not all fit exactly, but the kids really enjoy playing with it and it can take a beating. It's been thrown around multiple times and still hasn't broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it...
customer_reviews.text: My soon to be 3 old year daughter loves it. She has the Mr. Potato head, but was up late doing Amazon shopping lol, and decided to get this one for her as well. She plays with them both and dresses up every way she can. She loves them, and definitely keeps her busy/occupied for a decent amount of time lol. For the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony W.

customer_reviews.title: Old school is better!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe it took me over a year to purchase this item! Hello staying old school and by a 1 year this toy is amazing! It was my favorite as a child and with technology taking over youngsters this was awesome! It helps with hand-eye coordination, Problem solving, Brain Building, Understanding the body!! I have bought one for every 1st first!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Get your kid this awesome toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great classic if that I find all kids really still enjoy. This was an amazing praise for the size of the toy. The door opening on the back tends to fall off but I've noticed that his with all the potato heads, not just this one. Was it like that when we were kids?
customer_reviews.author: Kaaren

customer_reviews.title: Great toy just damaged packaging
customer_reviews.text: Loved the price, love the toy, was planning on giving this as a gift but the packaging was dented and damaged, so it’s not really gift quality, unless someone “accidentally steps” on it during the party and then you say “oops, but its Still okay”. It came in a soft sided envelope, not a box to preserve the fragile packaging the toy came in.
customer_reviews.author: Customer115

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought Playskool Mrs. Potato Head when it was at a great price and plan on giving it as a gift along with Mr. Potato Head. Both look exactly like the ones from years ago that many kids enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: citrushome

customer_reviews.title: A great update on a classic
customer_reviews.text: The biggest updated are the shoes and the arms. The shoes actually stay on and the potato is free standing, and you can pull the arms off and put them in without needing vice-grips. My three-year old loves this move and the updated Mr Potato Head. She can put the pieces anywhere and assemble it all by herself. There are two mouths and two noses, and one set of each of the other items. The hair and the feet don't fit inside the potato. Would definitely recommend for children between 2 and 5.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Just like I remembered.😃
customer_reviews.text: I'm 66 and still remember playing with my Mr/Mrs. Potato Head. Bought this for my grandkids and they LOVE it. Can't beat that it's made by Playskool. Lots of pieces and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth S

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a gift. I ordered it for my daughter for Christmas and she loved it. She loves all the accessories. I loved being able to order it and have it arrive fast without having to go to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron R.

customer_reviews.title: A Classic & Fun Toy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s Mrs. Potato Head, still hanging in there after all these years! What’s not to love, this made a great gift for a Toys for Tots drive and I trust is providing many smiles with simple & imaginative fun!
customer_reviews.author: Big Weave

customer_reviews.title: Pieces come off easily
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it is how the toy is made these days but the potato is very hard plastic and the pieces don't really stay put. It's hard for my little guys to push hard enough to get the pieces to stay.
customer_reviews.author: RyanM

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 21 month old and she adores this Mrs. Potatohead doll! The pieces are just big enough so she cant put them in her mouth/swallow them. Definetly reccomend to anyone looking for a gift/toy for baby 18 month and older
customer_reviews.author: Darienne

customer_reviews.title: Needs more....
customer_reviews.text: I wish this potato head came with extra accessories. When I was a kid potato head came with lots of extras. The only extra accessory it came with was a tongue so you could replace the mouth with a tongue. Still a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie J

customer_reviews.title: The hair won’t stay on.
customer_reviews.text: I have triplet toddlers so I got the me and mrs potatoe heads. I don’t feel they are made as well as they use to. The hair on the girl won’t stay on no matter what we do. It pops off.... which drove my kids crazy so we had to take the toy away.
customer_reviews.author: Darkcar

customer_reviews.title: Her hair is so annoying!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves potato head but this one is a bit irritating. The hair does not stay on, because it doesn't have a peg to put in the hat hole, I guess so you can put other hats on top, but this means it's constantly falling off and frustrating my 2 year old. I got so stick of him asking me to put it back on just so it would fall off 3 seconds later that we usually stick another face piece, like the mouth, into the top hole to keep the hair on, but then she's got a mouth on her hair and it's just weird!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a great deal. Wrong! None of the pieces fit correctly. They all fall out anytime you pick it up. My daughter got so frustrated with it.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Roe

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and perfect size for toddlers. I use this for an educational toy for my one year old. The only complaint o have is that the hair doesn't stay on too well and the body kind of detaches from the legs easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves putting this thing together. My older one loved it as well. I’d definitely recommend - good toy. She is 20 months and she is capable to attach the parts. Maybe in the wrong spots but it doesn’t matter really.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 3-year-old granddaughter for Christmas and she loves it! She thinks it's so funny and has played with it a lot since Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Feisty49

customer_reviews.title: Being used to teach genetics
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law uses Mr. and Mrs. Potato Head to teach genetics to high schoolers! I love her creativity. I'll bet there won't be another review like this!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Irelan

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 year old and small motor skills.
customer_reviews.text: Having to insert all the pieces takes some effort for a 19 month old. Our grand baby did it over and over until she got it. Also helped her figure out where all the head parts go. Hair doesn't stay on at all though.
customer_reviews.author: Weanling

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been wanting this for a long time so I finally got her one for Christmas along with the Mr. Potato head. She loves it so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my toddler who loves them and it's been really great. The ears have earrings drawn on them so ...
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find Mrs. Potato Head in stores. There's a million Mr's but no Mrs's. Anyway, I got this for my toddler who loves them and it's been really great. The ears have earrings drawn on them so they are different from the regular ears which is good and bad. Good because it differentiates and helps my toddler to pay attention to detail but bad because it seems like you can never find the matching pair in our big bin of toys. Either way, it was exactly what I thought it would be and my 3 year old loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun toy for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: My kids loves this toy! It is easy to put together and a lot of fun for kids (maybe even adults!) My only issue is that the packaging for the toy was damaged but not the item itself.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.

customer_reviews.title: Hard for a child to do by their self..
customer_reviews.text: A real cute toy...but the material is so hard a child cannot hardly put the ears, etc. into the potato head..needs an adult to push them in...the butt also keeps falling out...a little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra  Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute Christmas gift for my toddler. She likes to assemble all of the body parts and I like to think that it helps her fine motor skills.
customer_reviews.author: Dillydally123

customer_reviews.title: I hate this. Some of the parts do not stay ...
customer_reviews.text: I hate this. Some of the parts do not stay put (i.e. the HAIR) and other parts are difficult to push through the holes. I read a bunch of reviews, good and bad, prior to purchasing this item. I sure wish I heeded the advice of the negative reviewers.. My daughter got so frustrated with it not working properly that I put it away and will probably throw it away soon.
customer_reviews.author: K&R

customer_reviews.title: Not made like older ones
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with the quality of the mrs. Potato head. It’s definitely not the same as the one I had when I was little
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Potato head and they are both extremely cute and I think that they are great for teaching body parts and clothing to toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I got both Mr. & Mrs. Potato head and they are both extremely cute and I think that they are great for teaching body parts and clothing to toddlers. My two year old really enjoys playing with them. With that said, I was disappointed in the quality. I remember having these toys when I was a kid and they were built much, much better. The toy being so lightweight is great, but the pieces don't want to stay in which is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: heather kazay

customer_reviews.title: I love how the feet/pants are one whole piece
customer_reviews.text: Mrs. Potato Head was a toy I grew up playing with so I of course had to buy this for my girls too. Times sure have changed though, I love how the feet/pants are one whole piece, her shoes are amazing! The pieces fit on the potato great, and my girls love playing with him. You can't go wrong with a Mrs. Potato Head (or a Mr. Potato Head, I say buy both!) as a gift for any toddler/preschooler. It will be played with for years!
customer_reviews.author: Darci Bean

customer_reviews.title: Practical for little ones with delays
customer_reviews.text: They feel a bit cheap but you can’t beat the price. I use for my little one with delays.. teaching her body parts.
customer_reviews.author: Kesia Peru

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. I purchased these for my children for their toy story collection but when receiving them one was completely opened and the packaging just hanging there.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya F.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy every kid needs
customer_reviews.text: It came in a perfect nice box. I bought for my niece so there will be a later update.
customer_reviews.author: Cris Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great for children
customer_reviews.text: I loved this toy so cute ,compact and keeps my granddaughter busy...She loves it as well, and you can put most part inside Mrs potatoe head..Great price as well...
customer_reviews.author: Glam Maw

customer_reviews.title: Her hair doesn't have a post that goes in a hole in her head like the other pieces do
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy. Only 3 stars because no matter how I try I cannot get her hair to stay on her head. Her hair doesn't have a post that goes in a hole in her head like the other pieces do. It looks like it's supposed to fit on top of her head and then wrap under her ears. It doesn't really do that and as a result won't stay on. So my Mrs Potato head is bald pretty much all the time. I expected a little more femininity from a lady potato.
customer_reviews.author: DCmom

customer_reviews.title: Things fall out easily
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my toddler. Be aware that todays potato head toys aren't as good as ones from your own childhood. Ears, mouth, eyc keep falling out the second they are put in. I might put washi tape on the pegs to tighten things up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one “face” to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: This was such a disappointment. I purchase it for my 2 year old granddaughter envisioning the Mr. Potato Head my children had. The only interchangeable part is one for the mouth. Otherwise, it is one set of ears, one pair of eyes, a nose and a hat. No room for creative play by having lots of pieces and even my 2 year old knows where eyes, ears, nose and mouth go. She put it together once. There is no reason to play it again. Definitely a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Retherford

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME for classroom
customer_reviews.text: My students love playing with this; in fact I had to get 3 potato heads so there were enough different pieces/heads to share.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Jo Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Mrrs. Potato
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it... The back is hard to close even for an adult but she plays with it often
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Reed

customer_reviews.title: A cute teachable toy.
customer_reviews.text: My preschoolers love "Mrs. Potato head." She's fun to play and learn from. Her parts are easy to take off and put on. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy with accessories that my 3 year old loves to play with
customer_reviews.author: Chamaole

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the retro toys
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandaughter is having fun with this. I couldn’t find this local, so I was so glad Amazon had it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with a Potato Head toy.
customer_reviews.author: JJones

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it just wish she had some more pieces
customer_reviews.author: TAMARA MORRISON

customer_reviews.title: Love the toy!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped with heavy objects and packaging was severely damaged. Fortunately, the toy was fine. We love this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: For my grandson due in July....I’m sure he will love it
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is destroyed
customer_reviews.text: I planned on saving this for Christmas for my daughter...but the packaging is all beat up. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Like all Potato Head toys, some of the pieces just don't seem to fit quite right, but my daughter loves it and can play with it for a long long time. Slightly different size from earlier potato head toys, but all the attachments from the old toys fit on this one as well. However, some of the attachments made specifically for this model (like the fairy princess attachments) will only fit on this one, not the older ones. Not a big problem. Just something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy wont break easy. Paint has not peeled or chipped. Great toy made well
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loves the Mrs.!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up with potato head and wanted to order my daughter one. It does seem this one; the Mrs. is a bit smaller than the one I am used to. For that I am deducting a star. However, it is very well received! My daughter loves playing with it! I love that you can place the parts in the back, it opens up. You can also clean the parts without fear of rusting which is nice as well. I love this toy and so does my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Sage

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 y.o. and she just loves it! I ended up getting her the Mr. Potato Head to match.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Got as a Christmas gift for my daughter. All parts were in perfect condition. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Both our 2 and 4 year old wanted this for Christmas. I was hesitant to buy it, thinking it would be a toy that gets forgotten after being opened. That has not been the case. Both girls love this toy! We labeled the pieces so their wouldn't be fighting over who's was who's. I was also nervous about pieces not staying in place, per other reviews. We haven't had a problem with that. Great toy for girls who want a potato head.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: My 21 mos. old grand daughter loved Mr. And Mrs. Potato Head. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: A OLSEN

customer_reviews.title: Great to reinforce knowledge of body parts.
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loves this. Others have said that the pieces were hard to push in. My Granddaughter is only two and she has no problem. An excellent toy to reinforce knowledge of body parts. She loves it!!?
customer_reviews.author: Curly57

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for a learning child.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed Mrs potatoes heads hair kept falling off. Great toy for a learning child. The CV old stuletoy is still a hit. Except for her hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Found out afterwards the hair modules was broken or forgotten to attach and the hair doesn’t stay on. It was defective
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Different plastic than other Mr. Potato Head toys
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a lighter type of plastic than my other Mr. Potato Head so some of the pieces (esp. the hair and ears) do not stay in place when interchanged. That said, it was on sale and my students do not seem to mind so it does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: JennyJ!

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Kids like it but the hair and feet don't stay on at all.
customer_reviews.author: MrsM

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Best for the Price Perfect Companion to Mr Potato head.
customer_reviews.author: Leah L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Always loved the Mr. Potato series growing up but when I got this for my friend's daughter she got scared of it. They're going to keep trying I guess.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tioseco

customer_reviews.title: Some parts like the hair fall off while other parts are so ...
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced and dysfunctional. Some parts like the hair fall off while other parts are so hard to put that even for an adult is not fun. I am not sure how this toy has ever been of any value to anyone. I assume that someplace somewhere a functional one must has been manufactured. Regretfully, we missed the limited return window and now is taking space in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with a Potato Head!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very well. My daughter loves her Mrs. Potato head. I like how the legs are bigger now. It helps to keep her standing upright.
customer_reviews.author: Cherise

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: Gifted as a Christmas to my son. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this. The only negative so far is that her hat doesn't really stay on that well.
customer_reviews.author: Tflo

customer_reviews.title: A Classic
customer_reviews.text: Who does not love a Potato Head. I ordered three of these for the church nursery!
customer_reviews.author: CAH

customer_reviews.title: I remember as a kid they were super durable, but this seems a little thinner
customer_reviews.text: I am an online ESL teacher and use this almost every day for class. The only negative is that the potato body is a big...weak. I remember as a kid they were super durable, but this seems a little thinner.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought for toys for tots program. Wished item had more piecs. Cute.
customer_reviews.author: Pickyone

customer_reviews.title: Torn Box
customer_reviews.text: Price was good but box came torn in two places. This was part of a gift for a 2 year old and I had to tape the box back together, just didn't look very good.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas
customer_reviews.text: This was. a great gift for my 1 year old niece
customer_reviews.author: leanna

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was packaged well and is exactly what was described. My students are excited to use it in our classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The hair doesn't sit well with the ears. The pants don't say on either.
customer_reviews.author: MJDRCC

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for the kid. Real product, came on time, undamaged, and the kid loves them! Only 4 stars because for whatever reason, the hair piece included did not have a plug on it so that it connects to Ms Potato Head like every other piece there is. It was weird, but renders the hair piece useless essentially.
customer_reviews.author: Colin J

customer_reviews.title: Interest
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyable for the baby but becomes dull to the child very quick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: classic and must have toy
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for toddlers, educational toys, my 20 months old daughter love it.
customer_reviews.author: Grecsy Vieira

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: So cute and perfect match for Mr. Potato head. The kids at my daughters school have so much fun building these.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Toy came exactly as pictured with yellow hair and no ...
customer_reviews.text: Toy came exactly as pictured with yellow hair and no hat. The hair has a hole in the top and no peg, so the hair doesn't stay on, and there's no extra piece to stick through the top. We stick the nose on top of her head so she's not bald. Put a peg on the hair or throw a hat in there. In my opinion this toy is incomplete out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: jkaras

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just like my childhood one, perfect for my 2 year old twins
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! She is almost 2 and very much enjoying Mrs. Potato head.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Bad spud
customer_reviews.text: Not very pleased with this potato head, bought her for my daughter and doesnt seem very well put together. (Almost to the point of me thinking its bootleg) door on back falls off with slightest touch and 1/2 the accessories need to be jammed in. Definitely not as fun or close to the old versions
customer_reviews.author: DeadStockNYC

customer_reviews.title: Play mate
customer_reviews.text: She is cute, she is a playmate for our Mr potato head, I like her red boots! My daughter likes the hair! We get a kick out of playing with her it's fun and imaginative!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great memories
customer_reviews.text: I went back to my childhood with it! I’m so happy my daughter can have one like I did in my time
customer_reviews.author: carlos london

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Great price!! As described! My daughter has been bugging me for one for weeks so online ordering is the easiest!
customer_reviews.author: Crystile34

customer_reviews.title: Great buy great gift
customer_reviews.text: I love it for my babies birthday it came so fast I was wondering how long bt I was surprised how quickly it arrived literally the next day I love it
customer_reviews.author: destiny Campos

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as when I grew up but still a great gift for the little ones
customer_reviews.author: lovelifealways

customer_reviews.title: Classic and still popular
customer_reviews.text: We bought my son Mr and Mrs. Potato Head for Christmas. He was almost 2 yo. He loves them! He loves for me to put them together and then him to take apart. My nephews have a slew of these as well and they are 5 and 9 and they still play with theirs. Honestly, I think they are still fun to put together and I am a grown adult. Great toy that spans generations!
customer_reviews.author: LilBear0420

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Purchased both Mr. and Ms. Potatoe head for my grand daughter. She loved the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Bivens

customer_reviews.title: Classic & Still a Hit
customer_reviews.text: Still a hit after all of these years! Got some Picasso stuff going on with the two-year olds, but they also put pieces in correct locations. They love it!
customer_reviews.author: MegsBhs

customer_reviews.title: It was great to find that there are different potato head people ...
customer_reviews.text: Biggest problem with buying a potato head is more than one grandchild wants to use it at a time. It was great to find that there are different potato head people for the variety. Having four sets now gives the kids lots of options on how they put their potato heads together. The kids all love playing with these.
customer_reviews.author: Happy-Leroy

customer_reviews.title: very poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This was a total waste of money, her hair wouldn't click on to her head, too cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Wiser

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality compared to previous potato heads
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poor quality compared to previous potato heads. Potato is smaller, thinner plastic, and has rough edges/seams. Accessories don't fit well in new potato or in the older version I have. Definitely would have paid $5 more for better quality. Disappointing purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: Mrs Potato Head
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for nieces. And they enjoyed playing with it for hours. Good value
customer_reviews.author: Helen Hubmann

customer_reviews.title: Who can not love the potato heads
customer_reviews.text: Who can not love the potato heads? This one is just like the one I bought my son 29 years ago.Now its time for the granddaughter to enjoy this timeless toy.
customer_reviews.author: M Dobson

customer_reviews.title: This is an ok toy for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a good toy. My 2 yr old has a bit of a hard time sticking the pieces in the potatoe. He gets frustrated if I don't help him. It helps with motor skills and he does like playing with it when he has help so I gave it 3 stars. I definitely would not pay over $8 for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom3

product_meta.title: Playskool Mrs. Potato Head, 7.6 inches
product_meta.description:
Mr Potato Head Playskool

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A slimmer, more active Mrs. Potato Head has more holes than she used to and more facial features. Your child will love putting her nose where her ear should be and building many different versions of the original potato friend.
feature_bullets: The parts are compatible with other versions of Mr. or Mrs. Potato Head
Mrs. Potato Head has had a makeover and now has legs, more holes, and a slimmer, sassier look
Store the parts in the figure’s Tater Tush
Potato figure comes with eyes, nose, mouth, purse, hairdo, tongue, 2 hands, 2 ears and 1 pair of legs with shoes
The parts are compatible with other versions of Mr. or Mrs. Potato Head
